name: Life Pact
description:
Face off against the undead horde in this top-down roguelike where your life is the currency!

You can increase your maximum health by picking up skulls infused with special power. You can then exchange your maximum health for sweet items and powerups in the shop!

Be careful though, if you run out of maximum health, you will die!

Good luck!!

Post-Jam Version

We have added the ability to choose to play an updated version of this game. The post-jam version contains bug fixes, balancing and other improvements added after the Ludum Dare deadline. Please keep in mind that the you should still rate the original version of the game.
